name: BLOO RAT ball
description:
get the ball to the finish line at the other end of the platforms but its not as easy as it sounds in this free to play addition to the bloo rat games  you will rage and have fan at the same time 

2021 wotring games 

1 player 

dose not support controller made for keyboard and touch screen controls 

controls useing arrow keys or joystick 

rated for all ages 

based on eathen wotring's claymation web show BLOO RAT 

made for windows 10 but tested and can play on windows 7  runs great on any android device  

made with   with gamemaker3D
